summary: E-commerce project with homepage featuring product category carousels, animated product cards, masonry grid, live filters, and search bar. Admin features and product pages with filters/navigation are in scope.
architectural_notes: Homepage includes product category carousels with associated horizontally scrollable product rows (3 cards visible, no scrollbar)
Product pages require filters and navigation components

existing_features.title: Remove the 'Our Story' strip component (OurStoryStrip) from the homepage (HomePage.tsx). Delete all references to it in the page layout.

Ensure all product category pages (CategoryPageTemplate and all category-specific pages) include a functional filter bar (ProductFilterBar) with metal type, price range, occasion, and sort order filters, and a category navigation bar (HeaderCategoryNav) for switching between categories. If either is missing, add it.

On the homepage, below each product category carousel section (rendered by HomeCategoryCarouselsSection or equivalent), add a horizontally scrollable row of small square product cards. Each row must show products belonging to the relevant category. Exactly 3 square cards should be visible on screen at a time. The scrollbar must be hidden (no visible scrollbar). Each card should display the product image, name, and price.
